resources.string: We recommend using headphones to play this game.
Game made by Blind Faith Games
This application works on landscape mode

This is a research project that tries to gather insight on how blind people play games on mobile devices and how developers could make games that are not only accessible, but also enjoyable for them. Select an interaction mode depending on if you have visual discapacity or not. To select make a long press on the option

We advise you to download the "IVONA Text-to-Speech HQ" synthesizer, because it has a goog quality. We are not colaborating with IVONA project but is the best synthetizer we have found. Would you like to install it?

This is a research project that tries to gather insight on how blind people play games on mobile devices and how developers could make games that are not only accessible, but also enjoyable for them. Select an interaction mode depending on if you have visual discapacity or not. To select make a long press on the option
Main menu Zarodnik Game, you can navigate through the menu by making simple taps in the different options and just make a long press to select one of the options below
Music by www.SoundJay.com \n and www.freesound.org \n Insertar nombre grupo UCM, 2011-2012.
It shows text that contains the sinthetizer speech
It adds one more touch to every screen touch event
Allows to use the application without any visual reference in the game and main menu.
Enables to shoot when a on up event occurs
Menu settings. Clicking on each element on this menu changes and reads an option. You have the next options on this menu\:

Game Started! You begin in the center of the bottom on the screen. Remember you have to find the prey and avoid the predators. On the top on the screen there is a scoreboard where you can listen to your punctuation doing long clicks.

Key Configuration. Clicking on your left you can listen action descriptions and on your right you can change the key related with an action. If you are in blind interaction mode you have to do a long click to be able to change the configuration .You have the next options\:
To repeat the last sinthetizer voice message
Your punctuaction have been incremented to
Your punctuaction have been decremented to
Your number of consecutive shots is zero.

Había una vez, un pequeño monstruo de origen incierto, que viajaba inmerso por las profundidades del océano. A lo largo de su viaje, se fue encontrando con diferentes criaturas y fue aprendiendo aspectos acerca de la supervivencia. Cierto día nuestro protagonista alcanzó uno de los mayores océanos del mundo, el océano de Izlude. Este era el país más próspero del mundo pero bajo las aguas de sus mares se estaba produciendo una masacre que nadie podía evitar. Los Obeaune una raza de anfibios dotados de gran agilidad pero extremadamente débiles se encontraban subyugados por los Strouf... Apenas quedaban unas centenas de Obeaunes. Los Strouf son una raza especialmente agresiva controla actualmente la región del océano que ha alcanzado nuestro protagonista. Nuestro se ve inmerso en está situación en la que tratará de rescatar el mayor número posible de obeaunes almacenandolos en su interior pero hay un problema... Nuestro protagonista tiene una capacidad limitada ¿Qué le deparará su aventura?

Había una vez, un pequeño monstruo de origen incierto, que viajaba inmerso por las profundidades del océano. A lo largo de su viaje, se fue encontrando con diferentes criaturas y fue aprendiendo aspectos acerca de la supervivencia. Cierto día nuestro protagonista alcanzó uno de los mayores océanos del mundo, el océano de Izlude. Este era el país más próspero del mundo pero bajo las aguas de sus mares se estaba produciendo una masacre que nadie podía evitar. Los Obeaune una raza de anfibios dotados de gran agilidad pero extremadamente débiles se encontraban subyugados por los Strouf... Apenas quedaban unas centenas de Obeaunes. Los Strouf son una raza especialmente agresiva controla actualmente la región del océano que ha alcanzado nuestro protagonista. Nuestro se ve inmerso en está situación en la que tratará de rescatar el mayor número posible de obeaunes almacenandolos en su interior pero hay un problema... Nuestro protagonista tiene una capacidad limitada ¿Qué le deparará su aventura?
The game concludes here. Long touch on the screen to end
Long click to back to the main menu
You have changed the key associated with
That sound represents the capsule that you can find in the screen. Randomly increments/decrements your size.
If you want to leave this info page do an a long touch on the screen.
On this screen you will learn the sounds related the game elements. Remember! In this tips, double tap on different positions on the screen to listen different sounds.
That sound represents a Strouf which is a powerful race that take over the ocean of Izlude. You must avoid this creatures or you end badly.

That sound represents an Obeaune a race of weakness creatures. Only a few have survive. Your task will be to find and to save as many Obeaunes you can store. But there is a problem, if you save a lot of them you will grow rather and harder will be avoid Stroufs.
That sound represents an emitter lotam. Rest of an ancient civilitation previous to obeaune. It will help you to know the direction where the obeaune of the screen stays.
That sound represents a legendary Chainfish. This mysterious creature lives in the oceans of Izlude and it said that who eat it can be able to avoid Strouf\'s attacks temporaly.
That sound represents a Dr. Konstantin that allows you rescuing more Obeaune a decreasing the player size.

To move simply you have to drag your finger on the screen and when you release the touch, everything on the screen will be paused until the next touch. Double click to listen the sound emitted by the hero when it\'s moving.

The game objetive is to eat as many preys as you can, avoiding every predator that you can listen around the screen. The more preys eat, the better the game. Once devoured the prey, you have to go to one of the edges of the screen to move to the next level and continue the game.

To be able to know which creature is around you in the ocean of Izlude, you have to use headphones. If you hear a sound from yout left headphone that indicates that the creature is on your left and depending on the sound pitch, low or high it can be above or below your position on the screen. Remember that, you indicate it with your finger doing drags.
You can listen to the number of rescued Obeaunes doing long tap on the top on the screen there is a scoreboard.
Here you can learn the basics to play. On the next screens, to listen the entities sounds you have to do double click on the screen.

You can navigate through this form menu by making long taps on the buttons next and previous situated below of each option set or text. If you click on a text or a button its text will be read and, important!! if it\'s a answer button will be selected.
In this case, if you want, you can write in a field your opinion about the application.
From now on, making taps, you can choose between different answers to respond questions.
You can fill this field with your opinion.

This is a research project that tries to gather insight on how blind people play games on mobile devices and how developers could make games that are not only accessible, but also enjoyable for them. To fulfill these goals, we would like to know some details about you and how you interact with technologies in general and games in particular. This will help us to interpret your answers to this questionnaire. All the information collected through this questionnaire will be anonymous, untraceable and will be treated confidentially and only used for the purpose of the study. \n
Mark the option that better describes your current visual level
Rate how often you play games in your computer or game console. Where 1 means "Never" and 5 "very often"
Rate how often you play games in your mobile device (phone or tablet). Where 1 means "Never" and 5 "very often"
Please rate how easy/difficult it was to learn to play. Where 1 means "very difficult" and 5 "very easy".
Rate how fun it was to play. Where 1 means "very boring" and 5 "very fun".
Rate how engaging was the game. Where 1 means "not engaging" and 5 "very engaging".
Rate how pleasant or frustrating was the interaction with the game. Where 1 means "very frustrating" and 5 "very pleasant".
Rate how you liked the story and narrative atmosphere (if applicable). Where 1 means "I didn\'t like it at all" and 5 "I liked it very much".
Rate how you liked the accessibility and control settings. Where 1 means "I didn\'t like it at all" and 5 "I liked it very much".
Rate how you liked the feedback provide by the game. Where 1 means "I didn\'t like it at all" and 5 "I liked it very much".
Finally, please provide any comments or suggestions to improve the game. Then tap on "Finish" to send the responses to us, and that\'s all!
Your screen has turned on. May be you have to unlock your device.
Long click on the screen to continue.
